sourcesContent: import styled from"styled-components";import IconButton from"@scaleflex/ui/core/icon-button";import Input from"@scaleflex/ui/core/input";import Label from"@scaleflex/ui/core/label";var StyledResizeWrapper=styled.div.withConfig({componentId:"sc-17otqpz-0"})(["display:flex;justify-content:",";align-items:center;flex-wrap:wrap;"],function(a){var b=a.alignLeft;return b?"left":"center"}),StyledResizeInput=styled(Input).withConfig({componentId:"sc-17otqpz-1"})(["width:70px;height:24px;margin:",";"],function(a){var b=a.noLeftMargin;return b?"8px 8px 8px 0":"8px"}),StyledRatioLockIcon=styled(IconButton).withConfig({componentId:"sc-17otqpz-2"})(["margin-right:16px;"]),StyledXLabel=styled(Label).withConfig({componentId:"sc-17otqpz-3"})(["font-size:13px;line-height:15px;"]);export{StyledResizeWrapper,StyledResizeInput,StyledRatioLockIcon,StyledXLabel};
